title: FS: n172 Browns Champs Gleason - COPYRIGHT LINE
author: bn2cardz

posts.post_title: FS: n172 Browns Champs Gleason - COPYRIGHT LINE
posts.post_content:
The Brown's Champion cards are known to come with or without a Copyright line. I don't know how rare this is, but I have not been able to find another image of a Gleason Brown's Champions with the Copyright line.  

Cardtarget has 5 different copies, none with the copyright line.  The copies used in the Old Judge book don't have it.  The random google images I scanned through all are missing this line.

The negative about the card is that it is rebacked.  SGC said they would start holdering rebacked cards, but I haven't had a reason to send it back in just to have it holdered as Authentic.

$550 net to me

[IMG]http://i1118.photobucket.com/albums/k607/bn2cardz/PreWar/n172gleason005-01_zpsptyaitfg.jpg[/IMG]
